sentences.english: Like blood , like good and like age , make the happiest marriage .
sentences.chinese: 門當戶對，品行相近，年齡相仿，是最完美的婚姻。

sentences.english: She is so cute that I think she is out of my league.
sentences.chinese: 她那麼漂亮，我們根本就不門當戶對。

sentences.english: She feels that just being regarded as like this is of equal status, to the identity that must heave our Luo house.
sentences.chinese: 她覺得這樣纔算是門當戶對，對得起我們洛家的身份。

sentences.english: I do not oppose it, and don't support also.
sentences.chinese: 我不反對“門當戶對”，但也不支持。
